summary: HERE IS A REPORT OF A TESLA MODEL X IN CHINA HAVING EVERY AIR-BAG IN THE CAR SUDDENLY GO OFF WHILST THE CAR WAS STATIONARY AT A TRAFFIC LIGHT.  HTTP://HZNEWS.HANGZHOU.COM.CN/SHEHUI/CONTENT/2017-06/27/CONTENT_6588362.HTM    (GOOGLE WILL TRANSLATE)     OCCUPANTS WERE SLIGHTLY INJURED BY THE AIR-BAGS.  IF TESLA AIR-BAGS WERE TO GO OFF RANDOMLY THEY COULD CAUSE A MAJOR CRASH.  THE OWNER CLAIMS THAT TESLA IS BEING UNCOOPERATIVE.  PLEASE INVESTIGATE
